00413 BOOLEAN InitJA2Sound( )
00414 {

00439 
00440 UINT32 PlayJA2Sample( UINT32 usNum, UINT32 usRate, UINT32 ubVolume, UINT32 ubLoops, UINT32 uiPan )
00441 {
00442       //SoundLog((CHAR8 *)String(" Play sound %s on volume %d", szSoundEffects[usNum], ubVolume));
00443 
00444       SOUNDPARMS spParms;
00445 
00446       memset(&spParms, 0xff, sizeof(SOUNDPARMS));
00447 
00448       spParms.uiSpeed = usRate;
00449       
00450       if ( strstr( szSoundEffects[usNum], "WEAPONS" ) == NULL )
00451       {
00452             spParms.uiVolume = CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( ubVolume );       
00453       }
00454       else
00455       {
00456             spParms.uiVolume = (UINT32)( ( ubVolume / (FLOAT) HIGHVOLUME ) * guiSoundEffectsVolume +.5 ) * (1 + gGameExternalOptions.guiWeaponSoundEffectsVolume / 100);
00457       }
00458 
00459       spParms.uiVolume &= 0xFFL;
00460       spParms.uiLoop = ubLoops;
00461       spParms.uiPan = uiPan & 0xFFL;
00462       spParms.uiPriority=GROUP_PLAYER;
00463 
00464       //SoundLog((CHAR8 *)String(" Play sound %s on volume %d", szSoundEffects[usNum], spParms.uiVolume));
00465 
00466       return(SoundPlay(szSoundEffects[usNum], &spParms));
00467 }
00468

00471 {

00477 
00478       spParms.uiVolume = CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( ubVolume );
00479       spParms.uiLoop = ubLoops;
00480       spParms.uiPan = uiPan;
00481       spParms.uiPriority=GROUP_PLAYER;
00482 
00483       return(SoundPlayStreamedFile(szSoundEffects[usNum], &spParms));
00484 }

00486 
00487 UINT32 PlayJA2SampleFromFile( STR8 szFileName, UINT32 usRate, UINT32 ubVolume, UINT32 ubLoops, UINT32 uiPan )
00488 {
00489       //SoundLog((CHAR8 *)String(" Play sound %s on volume %d", szFileName, ubVolume));
00490       // does the same thing as PlayJA2Sound, but one only has to pass the filename, not the index of the sound array
00491 
00492       SOUNDPARMS spParms;
00493 
00494       memset(&spParms, 0xff, sizeof(SOUNDPARMS));
00495 
00496       spParms.uiSpeed = usRate;
00497 
00498       if ( strstr( szFileName, "WEAPONS" ) == NULL )
00499       {
00500             spParms.uiVolume = CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( ubVolume );
00501       }
00502       else
00503       {
00504             spParms.uiVolume = (UINT32)( ( ubVolume / (FLOAT) HIGHVOLUME ) * guiSoundEffectsVolume +.5 ) * (1 + gGameExternalOptions.guiWeaponSoundEffectsVolume / 100);
00505       }
00506       
00507       spParms.uiLoop = ubLoops;
00508       spParms.uiPan = uiPan;
00509       spParms.uiPriority=GROUP_PLAYER;
00510 
00511       //SoundLog((CHAR8 *)String(" Play sound %s on volume %d", szFileName, spParms.uiVolume));
00512 
00513       return(SoundPlay((STR) szFileName, &spParms));
00514 }
00515 
00516 UINT32 PlayJA2StreamingSampleFromFile( STR8 szFileName, UINT32 usRate, UINT32 ubVolume, UINT32 ubLoops, UINT32 uiPan, SOUND_STOP_CALLBACK EndsCallback )
00517 {
00518 
00519       // does the same thing as PlayJA2Sound, but one only has to pass the filename, not the index of the sound array
00520 
00521   SOUNDPARMS spParms;
00522 
00523       memset(&spParms, 0xff, sizeof(SOUNDPARMS));
00524 
00525       spParms.uiSpeed = usRate;
00526       spParms.uiVolume = CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( ubVolume );
00527       spParms.uiLoop = ubLoops;
00528       spParms.uiPan = uiPan;
00529       spParms.uiPriority=GROUP_PLAYER;
00530     spParms.EOSCallback=EndsCallback;
00531 
00532       return( SoundPlayStreamedFile(szFileName, &spParms) );
00533 }

00550 {

00566 UINT32 PlaySoldierJA2Sample( UINT16 usID, UINT32 usNum, UINT32 usRate, UINT32 ubVolume, UINT32 ubLoops, UINT32 uiPan, BOOLEAN fCheck )
00567 {
00568 
00569       if( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
00570   {
00571         // CHECK IF GUY IS ON SCREEN BEFORE PLAYING!
00572         if ( ( MercPtrs[ usID ]->bVisible != -1 ) || !fCheck )
00573         {
00574               return( PlayJA2Sample( usNum, usRate, CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( ubVolume ), ubLoops, uiPan ) );
00575         }
00576   }
00577 
00578       return( 0 );
00579 }

00616 UINT32 CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( UINT32 uiVolume )
00617 {
00618       return( (UINT32) ( ( uiVolume / (FLOAT) HIGHVOLUME ) * guiSoundEffectsVolume +.5 ) );
00619 }

00622 #if 0

00625  // This function calculates the general LEFT / RIGHT direction of a gridno
00626  // based on the middle of your screen.

00629

00635

00638     {
00639      // yes, outside...
00640      if (dif > 0)
00641        return(25);
00642      else
00643        return(102);
00644     }
00645    else // inside screen
00646     if (dif > 0)
00647       return(LEFTSIDE);
00648     else

00657 // == Lesh slightly changed this function ============
00658 INT32 SoundDir( INT16 sGridNo )
00659 {
00660       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
00661       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
00662       INT16 sMiddleX;
00663       INT16 sDif, sAbsDif;
00664 
00665   if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
00666   {
00667     return( MIDDLEPAN );
00668   }
00669 
00670       // OK, get screen position of gridno.....
00671       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sWorldX, &sWorldY );
00672 
00673       // Get screen coordinates for current position of soldier
00674       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( (INT16)(sWorldX), (INT16)(sWorldY), &sScreenX, &sScreenY);
00675 
00676       // Get middle of where we are now....
00677       sMiddleX = gsTopLeftWorldX + ( gsBottomRightWorldX - gsTopLeftWorldX ) / 2;
00678 
00679       sDif = sMiddleX - sScreenX;
00680 
00681       if ( ( sAbsDif = abs( sDif ) ) > 64 )
00682     {
00683             // OK, NOT the middle.
00684             // Is it outside the screen?
00685             if ( sAbsDif > ( ( gsBottomRightWorldX - gsTopLeftWorldX ) / 2 ) )
00686         {
00687                   // yes, outside...
00688                   if ( sDif > 0 )
00689                   {
00690                         return( FARLEFT );
00691                         //return( 1 );
00692                   }
00693             else
00694             return( FARRIGHT );
00695             //return( 126 );
00696         }
00697             else // inside screen
00698             {
00699                   if ( sDif > 0)
00700                         return( LEFTSIDE );
00701                   else
00702                         return( RIGHTSIDE );
00703             }
00704     }
00705       else // hardly any difference, so sound should be played from middle
00706     return(MIDDLE);
00707 }
00708 
00709 
00710 INT32 SoundVolume( INT8 bInitialVolume, INT16 sGridNo )
00711 {
00712       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
00713       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
00714       INT16 sMiddleX, sMiddleY;
00715       INT16 sDifX, sAbsDifX;
00716       INT16 sDifY, sAbsDifY;
00717 
00718     if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
00719     {
00720         return( bInitialVolume );
00721     }
00722 
00723       // OK, get screen position of gridno.....
00724       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sWorldX, &sWorldY );
00725 
00726       // Get screen coordinates for current position of soldier
00727       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( (INT16)(sWorldX), (INT16)(sWorldY), &sScreenX, &sScreenY);
00728 
00729       // Get middle of where we are now....
00730       sMiddleX = gsTopLeftWorldX + ( gsBottomRightWorldX - gsTopLeftWorldX ) / 2;
00731       sMiddleY = gsTopLeftWorldY + ( gsBottomRightWorldY - gsTopLeftWorldY ) / 2;
00732 
00733       sDifX = sMiddleX - sScreenX;
00734       sDifY = sMiddleY - sScreenY;
00735 
00736       sAbsDifX = abs( sDifX );
00737       sAbsDifY = abs( sDifY );
00738 
00739       if ( sAbsDifX  > 64 || sAbsDifY > 64 )
00740     {
00741             // OK, NOT the middle.
00742             // Is it outside the screen?
00743             if ( sAbsDifX > ( ( gsBottomRightWorldX - gsTopLeftWorldX ) / 2 ) || 
00744                          sAbsDifY > ( ( gsBottomRightWorldY - gsTopLeftWorldY ) / 2 ) )
00745         {
00746                   return( __max( LOWVOLUME, ( bInitialVolume - SOUND_FAR_VOLUME_MOD ) ) );
00747         }
00748     }
00749       return( bInitialVolume );
00750 }
00751

00753 void PlayDelayedJA2Sample( UINT32 uiDelay, UINT32 usNum, UINT32 usRate, UINT32 ubVolume, UINT32 ubLoops, UINT32 uiPan )
00754 {
00755 
00756       memset(&gDelayedSoundParms, 0xff, sizeof(SOUNDPARMS));
00757 
00758       gDelayedSoundParms.uiSpeed = usRate;
00759       gDelayedSoundParms.uiVolume = CalculateSoundEffectsVolume( ubVolume );
00760       gDelayedSoundParms.uiLoop = ubLoops;
00761       gDelayedSoundParms.uiPan = uiPan;
00762       gDelayedSoundParms.uiPriority=GROUP_PLAYER;
00763 
00764       guiDelayedSoundNum = usNum;
00765 
00766       //return(SoundPlay(szSoundEffects[usNum], &spParms));
00767 
00768       // Setup multipurpose timer....
00769       SetCustomizableTimerCallbackAndDelay( uiDelay, DelayedSoundTimerCallback, FALSE );
00770 
00771 }
00772 
00773 void DelayedSoundTimerCallback( void )
00774 {
00775       SoundPlay( szSoundEffects[ guiDelayedSoundNum ], &gDelayedSoundParms );
00776 }

00781 
00782 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00783 /////////
00784 /////////
00785 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00786 // Positional Ambients
00787 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00788 #define           NUM_POSITION_SOUND_EFFECT_SLOTS                             10
00789 
00790 typedef struct
00791 {
00792   UINT32        uiFlags;
00793   INT16         sGridNo;
00794   INT32         iSoundSampleID;
00795   INT32         iSoundToPlay;
00796   UINT32        uiData;
00797   BOOLEAN       fAllocated;
00798   BOOLEAN       fInActive;
00799 
00800 } POSITIONSND;
00801 
00802 
00803 // GLOBAL FOR SMOKE LISTING
00804 POSITIONSND                   gPositionSndData[ NUM_POSITION_SOUND_EFFECT_SLOTS ];
00805 UINT32                                    guiNumPositionSnds = 0;
00806 BOOLEAN           gfPositionSoundsActive = FALSE;
00807 
00808 
00809 INT32 GetFreePositionSnd( void );
00810 void RecountPositionSnds( void );
00811 
00812 
00813 
00814 INT32 GetFreePositionSnd( void )
00815 {
00816       UINT32 uiCount;
00817 
00818       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumPositionSnds; uiCount++)
00819       {
00820             if(( gPositionSndData[uiCount].fAllocated==FALSE ) )
00821                   return( (INT32)uiCount );
00822       }
00823 
00824       if( guiNumPositionSnds < NUM_POSITION_SOUND_EFFECT_SLOTS )
00825             return( (INT32) guiNumPositionSnds++ );
00826 
00827       return( -1 );
00828 }
00829 
00830 void RecountPositionSnds( void )
00831 {
00832       INT32 uiCount;
00833 
00834       for(uiCount=guiNumPositionSnds-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00835       {
00836             if( ( gPositionSndData[uiCount].fAllocated ) )
00837             {
00838                   guiNumPositionSnds=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00839                   break;
00840             }
00841       }
00842 }
00843 
00844 
00845 INT32 NewPositionSnd( INT16 sGridNo, UINT32 uiFlags, UINT32 uiData, UINT32 iSoundToPlay )
00846 {
00847       POSITIONSND *pPositionSnd;
00848       INT32                   iPositionSndIndex;
00849 
00850       if( ( iPositionSndIndex = GetFreePositionSnd() )==(-1) )
00851             return(-1);
00852 
00853       memset( &gPositionSndData[ iPositionSndIndex ], 0, sizeof( POSITIONSND ) );
00854 
00855       pPositionSnd = &gPositionSndData[ iPositionSndIndex ];
00856 
00857 
00858   // Default to inactive
00859 
00860   if ( gfPositionSoundsActive )
00861   {
00862     pPositionSnd->fInActive   = FALSE;
00863   }
00864   else
00865   {
00866     pPositionSnd->fInActive   = TRUE;
00867   }
00868   
00869   pPositionSnd->sGridNo     = sGridNo;
00870   pPositionSnd->uiData      = uiData;
00871   pPositionSnd->uiFlags     = uiFlags;
00872   pPositionSnd->fAllocated  = TRUE;
00873   pPositionSnd->iSoundToPlay = iSoundToPlay;
00874 
00875   pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID = NO_SAMPLE;
00876 
00877   return( iPositionSndIndex );
00878 }
00879 
00880 void DeletePositionSnd( INT32 iPositionSndIndex )
00881 {
00882       POSITIONSND *pPositionSnd;
00883 
00884   pPositionSnd = &gPositionSndData[ iPositionSndIndex ];
00885 
00886   if ( pPositionSnd->fAllocated )
00887   {
00888      // Turn inactive first...
00889      pPositionSnd->fInActive = TRUE;
00890 
00891      // End sound...
00892      if ( pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID != NO_SAMPLE )
00893      {
00894         SoundStop( pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID );
00895      }    
00896 
00897      pPositionSnd->fAllocated = FALSE;
00898 
00899      RecountPositionSnds( );
00900   }
00901 }
00902 
00903 void SetPositionSndGridNo( INT32 iPositionSndIndex, INT16 sGridNo )
00904 {
00905       POSITIONSND *pPositionSnd;
00906 
00907   pPositionSnd = &gPositionSndData[ iPositionSndIndex ];
00908 
00909   if ( pPositionSnd->fAllocated )
00910   {
00911     pPositionSnd->sGridNo = sGridNo;
00912 
00913     SetPositionSndsVolumeAndPanning( );
00914   }
00915 }
00916 
00917 void SetPositionSndsActive( )
00918 {
00919   UINT32 cnt;
00920       POSITIONSND *pPositionSnd;
00921 
00922   gfPositionSoundsActive = TRUE;
00923 
00924   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumPositionSnds; cnt++ )
00925   {
00926       pPositionSnd = &gPositionSndData[ cnt ];
00927 
00928     if ( pPositionSnd->fAllocated )
00929     {
00930       if ( pPositionSnd->fInActive )
00931       {
00932         pPositionSnd->fInActive = FALSE;
00933 
00934         // Begin sound effect
00935         // Volume 0
00936         pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID = PlayJA2Sample( pPositionSnd->iSoundToPlay, RATE_11025, 0, 0, MIDDLEPAN );
00937       }
00938     }
00939   }
00940 }
00941 
00942 
00943 void SetPositionSndsInActive( )
00944 {
00945   UINT32 cnt;
00946       POSITIONSND *pPositionSnd;
00947 
00948   gfPositionSoundsActive = FALSE;
00949 
00950   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumPositionSnds; cnt++ )
00951   {
00952       pPositionSnd = &gPositionSndData[ cnt ];
00953 
00954     if ( pPositionSnd->fAllocated )
00955     {
00956       pPositionSnd->fInActive = TRUE;
00957 
00958       // End sound...
00959       if ( pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID != NO_SAMPLE )
00960       {
00961          SoundStop( pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID );
00962          pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID = NO_SAMPLE;
00963       }
00964     }
00965   }
00966 }
00967 
00968 // == Lesh slightly changed this function ============
00969 INT32 PositionSoundDir( INT16 sGridNo )
00970 {
00971       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
00972       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
00973       INT16 sMiddleX;
00974       INT16 sDif, sAbsDif;
00975 
00976   if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
00977   {
00978     return( MIDDLEPAN );
00979   }
00980 
00981       // OK, get screen position of gridno.....
00982       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sWorldX, &sWorldY );
00983 
00984       // Get screen coordinates for current position of soldier
00985       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( (INT16)(sWorldX), (INT16)(sWorldY), &sScreenX, &sScreenY);
00986 
00987       // Get middle of where we are now....
00988       sMiddleX = gsTopLeftWorldX + ( gsBottomRightWorldX - gsTopLeftWorldX ) / 2;
00989 
00990       sDif = sMiddleX - sScreenX;
00991 
00992       if ( ( sAbsDif = abs( sDif ) ) > 64 )
00993   {
00994             // OK, NOT the middle.
00995              
00996             // Is it outside the screen?
00997             if ( sAbsDif > ( ( gsBottomRightWorldX - gsTopLeftWorldX ) / 2 ) )
00998     {
00999                   // yes, outside...
01000                   if ( sDif > 0 )
01001                   {
01002                         return( FARLEFT );
01003                         //return( 1 );
01004                   }
01005      else
01006        return( FARRIGHT );
01007        //return( 126 );
01008 
01009     }
01010             else // inside screen
01011             {
01012                   if ( sDif > 0)
01013                         return( LEFTSIDE );
01014                   else
01015                         return( RIGHTSIDE );
01016             }
01017   }
01018       else // hardly any difference, so sound should be played from middle
01019     return(MIDDLE);
01020 }
01021 
01022 
01023 INT32 PositionSoundVolume( INT8 bInitialVolume, INT16 sGridNo )
01024 {
01025       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
01026       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
01027       INT16 sMiddleX, sMiddleY;
01028       INT16 sDifX, sAbsDifX;
01029       INT16 sDifY, sAbsDifY;
01030   INT16 sMaxDistX, sMaxDistY;
01031   double sMaxSoundDist, sSoundDist;
01032 
01033   if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
01034   {
01035     return( bInitialVolume );
01036   }
01037 
01038       // OK, get screen position of gridno.....
01039       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sWorldX, &sWorldY );
01040 
01041       // Get screen coordinates for current position of soldier
01042       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( (INT16)(sWorldX), (INT16)(sWorldY), &sScreenX, &sScreenY);
01043 
01044       // Get middle of where we are now....
01045       sMiddleX = gsTopLeftWorldX + ( gsBottomRightWorldX - gsTopLeftWorldX ) / 2;
01046       sMiddleY = gsTopLeftWorldY + ( gsBottomRightWorldY - gsTopLeftWorldY ) / 2;
01047 
01048       sDifX = sMiddleX - sScreenX;
01049       sDifY = sMiddleY - sScreenY;
01050 
01051       sAbsDifX = abs( sDifX );
01052       sAbsDifY = abs( sDifY );
01053 
01054   sMaxDistX = (INT16)( ( gsBottomRightWorldX - gsTopLeftWorldX ) * 1.5 );
01055   sMaxDistY = (INT16)( ( gsBottomRightWorldY - gsTopLeftWorldY ) * 1.5 );
01056 
01057   sMaxSoundDist = sqrt( (double) ( sMaxDistX * sMaxDistX ) + ( sMaxDistY * sMaxDistY ) );
01058   sSoundDist    = sqrt( (double)( sAbsDifX * sAbsDifX ) + ( sAbsDifY * sAbsDifY ) );
01059 
01060   if ( sSoundDist == 0 )
01061   {
01062     return( bInitialVolume );
01063   }
01064 
01065   if ( sSoundDist > sMaxSoundDist )
01066   {
01067     sSoundDist = sMaxSoundDist;
01068   }
01069 
01070   // Scale
01071   return( (INT8)( bInitialVolume * ( ( sMaxSoundDist - sSoundDist ) / sMaxSoundDist ) ) );
01072 }
01073 
01074 
01075 void SetPositionSndsVolumeAndPanning( )
01076 {
01077   UINT32 cnt;
01078       POSITIONSND *pPositionSnd;
01079   INT8        bVolume, bPan;
01080   SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01081 
01082   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumPositionSnds; cnt++ )
01083   {
01084       pPositionSnd = &gPositionSndData[ cnt ];
01085 
01086     if ( pPositionSnd->fAllocated )
01087     {
01088       if ( !pPositionSnd->fInActive )
01089       {
01090          if ( pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID != NO_SAMPLE )
01091          {
01092             bVolume = PositionSoundVolume( 15, pPositionSnd->sGridNo );
01093 
01094             if ( pPositionSnd->uiFlags & POSITION_SOUND_FROM_SOLDIER )
01095             {
01096                pSoldier = (SOLDIERTYPE*)pPositionSnd->uiData;
01097 
01098                if ( pSoldier->bVisible == -1 )
01099                {
01100                   // Limit volume,,,
01101                   if ( bVolume > 10 )
01102                   {
01103                     bVolume = 10;
01104                   }
01105                }
01106             }
01107 
01108                   //if the sound is from a stationay object
01109                   if( pPositionSnd->uiFlags & POSITION_SOUND_STATIONATY_OBJECT )
01110                   {
01111                         // make sure you can always hear it
01112                         if ( bVolume < 5 )
01113                         {
01114                               bVolume = 5;
01115                         }
01116                   }
01117 
01118             SoundSetVolume( pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID, bVolume );
01119 
01120             bPan = PositionSoundDir( pPositionSnd->sGridNo );
01121 
01122             SoundSetPan( pPositionSnd->iSoundSampleID, bPan );
01123          }
01124       }
01125     }
01126   }
01127 }
